content: The weapon comes with a respectable 70 damage, and the unique effect of increase the damage dealt by every attack while you are in Pillar Stance. Pillar Stance is the most specalized of the stances, but it can be useful for avoiding ground attacks or area-of-effect attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loongwreathe_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Loongwreathe Staff'.
The content is as follows:
The weapon comes with a respectable 70 damage, and the unique effect of increase the damage dealt by every attack while you are in Pillar Stance. Pillar Stance is the most specalized of the stances, but it can be useful for avoiding ground attacks or area-of-effect attacks.
